email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Oliver,

I hope you're doing well. We have a vessel available for your shipment of 25,000MT of Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam on CIF terms. The vessel PACIFIC DAWN, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m, is proposed with a laycan of October 10-15.

The initial freight quote is USD 58.50 per MT. Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lena Martinez
Sea Brokers International

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lena,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you consider lowering it to USD 56.00 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and any additional charges?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Oliver Thompson
Maritime Freight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Oliver,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 57.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 14,000 per day, pro rata.

Please note that the laycan remains October 10-15. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lena Martinez
Sea Brokers International

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lena,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 57.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Oliver Thompson
Maritime Freight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Oliver,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on October 10, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lena Martinez
Sea Brokers International

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lena,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Oliver Thompson
Maritime Freight Solutions
